column4: help, just took 512 out of my box now linux is failling to boot!!!
write the image to disk and boot from it.
try it again with the good stik out.
and let it run for a good while.
how what the average time for the test`?
some suggest overnight.  minimum hour to stress it and warm it up.
i had single channel setup with 3 dimms now dual channel, should that be the problem?
probably :)  check your mobo docs.  I bet it only likes certain numerical combinations.
i get thouthands of errors in test 7
gee... wonder what your problem is :)
espcially bad with onboard shared memory vid cards.
is it normal for ram to give errors during memtest? or is it normal when there ar eno errors at all?
normal?  no... good ram shouldn't give errors.  overclocked might etc.
